text: akasabhumikalute srsti natanna nal teatt allahuvinre atukkal ‎daivika pramanamanusaricc masannalute ennam pantrantan. avayil ‎nalennam yud'dham vilakkappettavayan. itan yathartha niyamakramam. ‎atinal a nalumasam ninnal ninnaleatutanne akramam ‎kanikkatirikkuka. bahudaiva visvasikal evvidham orrakkettayi ‎ninnaleat yud'dham ceyyunnuvea avvidham ninnalum onnayi avareat ‎yud'dham ceyyuka. ariyuka: allahu suksmatayullavareateappaman. ‎
